# PARA SERES HUMANOS

000 LOAD M(0F6) ; STOR M(00B,08:19)
001 STOR M(00B,28:40) ; LOAD M(0F5)
002 STOR M(008,8:19) ; LOAD M(0F1)
003 STOR M(0F3) ; LOAD M(0F4)
004 STOR M(0F9) ; LOAD M(0F9)
005 STOR M(00A,08:19) ; ADD M(0F7)
006 STOR M(0F9) ; LOAD M(0F1)
007 SUB M(0F3) ; STOR M(111)
008 LOAD M(000) ; STOR M(110)
009 JUMP M(113,0:19) ; LOAD MQ,M(112)
00A MUL (000) ; LOAD MQ
00B ADD M(000) ; STOR M(000)
00C LOAD M(0F9) ; ADD M(0F9)
00D STOR M(0F9) ; LOAD M(0F3) 
00E SUB M(0F7) ; STOR M(0F3) 
00F JUMP+M(004,20:39) ; LOAD M(0F6) 
010 ADD M(0F7) ; STOR M(0F6) 
011 LOAD M(0F5) ; ADD M(0F7)
012 STOR M(0F5) ; LOAD M(0F2)
013 SUB M(0F7) ; STOR M(0F2)
014 JUMP+M(000,0:19) ; JUMP M(014,0:19)

0F1 00 00 00 00 04 # CONST 4 (grau do polinomio - 1)
0F2 00 00 00 00 04 # i (representa a quantidade de coeficientes - 1)
0F3 00 00 00 00 04 # j (variavel auxiliar interna para loop interno)
0F4 00 00 00 00 FA # PONTEIRO PARA coef
0F5 00 00 00 01 00 # PONTEIRO PARA x
0F6 00 00 00 01 05 # PONTEIRO PARA Px
0F7 00 00 00 00 01 # CONST 1
0F8 00 00 00 00 02 # CONST 2
0F9 00 00 00 00 00 # PONTEIRO interno

0FA 00 00 00 00 02 # coef[0]
0FB FF FF FF FF FD # coef[1]
0FC 00 00 00 00 01 # coef[2]
0FD 00 00 00 00 00 # coef[3]
0FE 00 00 00 00 02 # coef[4]
100 00 00 00 00 01 # x[0]
101 00 00 00 00 03 # x[1]
102 00 00 00 00 05 # x[2]
103 00 00 00 00 07 # x[3]
104 00 00 00 00 09 # x[4]

105 00 00 00 00 00 # Px[0]
106 00 00 00 00 00 # Px[1]
107 00 00 00 00 00 # Px[2]
108 00 00 00 00 00 # Px[3]
109 00 00 00 00 00 # Px[4]

# PARAMETROS DA POW
110 00 00 00 00 00 # X[i]
111 00 00 00 00 00 # J
112 00 00 00 00 00 # RESULTADO DA POW

# FUNÇÃO_POW

113 LOAD -M(111); JUMP+M(11B, 20:39)
114 LOAD M(111); DIV(0F8)
115 SUB M(0F7); JUMP+M(11A, 0:19)
116 LOAD M(111); RSH
117 STOR M(111); LOAD MQ, M(110)
118 MUL M(110); LOAD MQ
119 STOR M(110); JUMP(113, 0:19)
11A LOAD MQ, M(110); MUL M(112)
11B LOAD MQ; STOR M(112)
11C JUMP M(116, 0:19); JUMP(009, 20:39)

#EM HEXCODE

000 010F61200B
001 1300B010F5
002 12008010F1
003 210F3010F4
004 210F9010F9
005 1200A050F7
006 210F9010F1
007 060F321111
008 0100021110
009 0D11309112
00A 0B0000A000
00B 0500021000
00C 010F9050F9
00D 210F9010F3
00E 060F7210F3
00F 10004010F6
010 010F5050F6
011 010F5050F7
012 210F5010F2
013 060F7210F2
014 0F0000E014

0F1 0000000004
0F2 0000000004
0F3 0000000004
0F4 00000000FA
0F5 0000000100
0F6 0000000105
0F7 0000000001
0F8 0000000002
0F9 0000000000

0FA 0000000002
0FB FFFFFFFFFD
0FC 0000000001
0FD 0000000000
0FE 0000000002
100 0000000001
101 0000000003
102 0000000005
103 0000000007
104 0000000009

105 0000000000
106 0000000000
107 0000000000
108 0000000000
109 0000000000


110 0000000000
111 0000000000
112 0000000000

113 021110F11B
114 011110C0F8
115 060F70F11A
116 0111115000
117 2111109110
118 0B1100A000
119 211100D113
11A 091100B112
11B 0A00021112
11C 0D1160E009
